languages.text: "Дети Азуриана, что опустились до игр в богов мон-кай? Горько слышать, как гибель Крудараха заставила мой народ сбиться с пути. И все же... душа моя поет от осознания, что кто-то из них отыскал себе безопасное прибежище".

traits.locale_text: "Дети Азуриан, что опустились до игр в богов мон-кай? Горько слышать, как гибель Крудараха заставила мой народ сбиться с пути. И все же... душа моя поет от осознания, что кто-то из них отыскал себе безопасное прибежище".
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "For Children of Asuryan to sink as low as playing gods to mon-keigh? It pains me to hear how Crudarach's doom has made my people lose their way. And yet... my soul sings with joy at the knowledge that some of them have found a safe haven."
languages.original_text: "Дети Азуриана, что опустились до игр в богов мон-кай? Горько слышать, как гибель Крудараха заставила мой народ сбиться с пути. И все же... душа моя поет от осознания, что кто-то из них отыскал себе безопасное прибежище".

traits.locale_text: "For Children of Asuryan to sink as low as playing gods for mon-keigh? It pains me to hear how Crudarach's doom has made my people lose their way. And yet... my soul sings with joy from the knowledge that some of them have found a safe haven."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "For Children of Asuryan to sink as low as playing gods for mon-keigh? It pains me to hear how Crudarach's doom has made my people lose their way. And yet... my soul sings with joy from the knowledge that some of them have found a safe haven."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "For Children of Asuryan to sink as low as playing gods to mon-keigh? It pains me to hear how Crudarach's doom has made my people lose their way. And yet... my soul sings with joy at the knowledge that some of them have found a safe haven."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "For Children of Asuryan to sink as low as playing gods to mon-keigh? It pains me to hear how Crudarach's doom has made my people lose their way. And yet... my soul sings with joy at the knowledge that some of them have found a safe haven."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "For Children of Asuryan to sink as low as playing gods to mon-keigh? It pains me to hear how Crudarach's doom has made my people lose their way. And yet... my soul sings with joy at the knowledge that some of them have found a safe haven."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: «¿Los hijos de Asuryan, rebajándose a interpretar el papel de dioses para los mon-keigh? Me duele constatar que la catástrofe de Crudarach ha hecho que mi gente pierda el norte. Y pese a todo... mi alma canta de júbilo sabiendo que han encontrado un refugio seguro».
languages.original_text: "For Children of Asuryan to sink as low as playing gods to mon-keigh? It pains me to hear how Crudarach's doom has made my people lose their way. And yet... my soul sings with joy at the knowledge that some of them have found a safe haven."

traits.locale_text: «¿Los hijos de Asuryan, rebajándose a interpretar el papel de dioses para los mon-keigh? Me duele constatar que la catástrofe de Crudarach ha hecho que mi gente pierda el norte. Y pese a todo... mi alma canta de júbilo sabiendo que han encontrado un refugio seguro».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: 「アシュリアンの御子らが、モン＝ケイの前で神を演じるまでに落ちぶれてしまったと？クルダラの崩壊がいかに同胞たちの道を失わせたか聞くのはつらいことだ。それでも…彼らの一部が安全な避難所を見つけたと知って、私の魂は喜びで歌っているよ」
languages.original_text: "For Children of Asuryan to sink as low as playing gods to mon-keigh? It pains me to hear how Crudarach's doom has made my people lose their way. And yet... my soul sings with joy at the knowledge that some of them have found a safe haven."

traits.locale_text: 「アシュリアンの御子らが、モン＝ケイの前で神を演じるまでに落ちぶれてしまったと？クルダラの崩壊がいかに同胞たちの道を失わせたか聞くのはつらいことだ。それでも…彼らの一部が安全な避難所を見つけたと知って、私の魂は喜びで歌っているよ」
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: “阿苏焉的子嗣已经沦落到要在猴子面前装神弄鬼的地步？克鲁达拉赫的厄运让我的族人迷失了方向，我很难过。不过……得知他们之中一部分找到了安全的避风港，我的心不由欢喜歌唱。”
languages.original_text: "For Children of Asuryan to sink as low as playing gods to mon-keigh? It pains me to hear how Crudarach's doom has made my people lose their way. And yet... my soul sings with joy at the knowledge that some of them have found a safe haven."

traits.locale_text: “阿苏焉的子嗣已经沦落到要在猴子面前装神弄鬼的地步？克鲁达拉赫的厄运让我的族人迷失了方向，我很难过。不过……得知他们之中一部分找到了安全的避风港，我的心不由欢喜歌唱。”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: « Les enfants d'Asuryan sont-ils donc tombés aussi bas ? Ils jouent ainsi aux dieux pour les mon-keigh ? Il me coûte de constater qu'après la chute de Crudarach, tant des miens se sont égarés. Et pourtant... Quelle joie que d'apprendre qu'ils ont trouvé un refuge... »
languages.original_text: "For Children of Asuryan to sink as low as playing gods to mon-keigh? It pains me to hear how Crudarach's doom has made my people lose their way. And yet... my soul sings with joy at the knowledge that some of them have found a safe haven."

traits.locale_text: « Les enfants d'Asuryan sont-ils donc tombés aussi bas ? Ils jouent ainsi aux dieux pour les mon-keigh ? Il me coûte de constater qu'après la chute de Crudarach, tant des miens se sont égarés. Et pourtant... Quelle joie que d'apprendre qu'ils ont trouvé un refuge... »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Kinder von Asuryan sind so tief gesunken, dass sie Chem-Pan-Sey gegenüber als Götter auftreten? Es schmerzt mich zu hören, wie mein Volk nach Crudarachs Untergang vom Weg abgekommen ist. Und dennoch... singt meine Seele vor Freude, dass ein paar von ihnen einen Zufluchtsort gefunden haben."
languages.original_text: "For Children of Asuryan to sink as low as playing gods to mon-keigh? It pains me to hear how Crudarach's doom has made my people lose their way. And yet... my soul sings with joy at the knowledge that some of them have found a safe haven."

traits.locale_text: "Kinder von Asuryan sind so tief gesunken, dass sie Chem-Pan-Sey gegenüber als Götter auftreten? Es schmerzt mich zu hören, wie mein Volk nach Crudarachs Untergang vom Weg abgekommen ist. Und dennoch... singt meine Seele vor Freude, dass ein paar von ihnen einen Zufluchtsort gefunden haben."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Asuryan'ın Çocukları'nın mon-keighleri kontrol edecek kadar alçalmaları... Crudarach'ın felaketinin halkımı yolundan bu denli saptırdığını duymak canımı yaktı. Yine de... Kimilerinin güvenli bir sığınak bulduğunu öğrendim ya, ruhum mutluluktan şakıyor."
languages.original_text: "For Children of Asuryan to sink as low as playing gods to mon-keigh? It pains me to hear how Crudarach's doom has made my people lose their way. And yet... my soul sings with joy at the knowledge that some of them have found a safe haven."

traits.locale_text: "Asuryan'ın Çocukları'nın mon-keighleri kontrol altına alacak kadar alçalmaları... Crudarach'ın felaketinin halkımı yolundan bu denli saptırdığını duymak bana acı veriyor. Ancak yine de... Bazılarının güvenli bir sığınak bulduğunu öğrendim ya, ruhum mutluluktan âdeta şakıyor."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
